duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide construction related legal advice and assist with construction contract negotiations.
Support business units focusing on construction in Oregon, California, and Arizona.
Negotiate, structure, and manage new contracts.
Draft bespoke contract templates and revise contracts to reflect project needs.
Negotiate with vendors and work with various levels of management.
Ensure prior experience and bar admittance in the jurisdictions specified.

education_certification.credential: Bar Admittance in Oregon, California, and Arizona
